channel.title: cross-domain on Jonathan`s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in cross-domain on Jonathan`s Blog

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 跨模态检索] Adaptive CM Prototypes for Cross-Domain VLR (CVPR 2021)
item.description: Adaptive Cross-Modal Prototypes for Cross-Domain Visual-Language Retrieval (CVPR 2021) 概述 将在带标签源域上学习到的模型迁移到不带标签的目标域的任务被称为无监督域自适应 (UDA)，本文研究 UDA 设定下的跨模态检索问
